content.rendered:
Directed by Norberto Barba. M.J. Bassett. Sam Hill. Omar Madha. Christine Moore. Lin Oeding. Stephen Surjik. Thomas Vincent.

Written by Lee Child. Lee Child. Nick Santora. Nick Santora. Cait Duffy. Cait Duffy. Aadrita Mukerji. Aadrita Mukerji. Scott Sullivan.

Cast  Malcolm Goodwin( Oscar Finlay ) . Willa Fitzgerald( Roscoe Conklin ) . Hugh Thompson( Officer Baker ) . Chris Webster( KJ ) . Bruce McGill( Mayor Grover Teale ) . Maxwell Jenkins( Young Reacher ) . Gavin White( Young Joe ) . Leslie Fray( Josephine Reacher ) . Jonathan Koensgen( Stevenson ) . Willie C. Carpenter( Mosley ) . Harvey GuillÃ©n( Jasper ) . Matthew Marsden( Stan ) . Martin Roach( Picard ) . A.J. Simmons( Dawson ) . Maria Sten( Frances Neagley ) . Kristin Kreuk( Charlene ‘Charlie’ Hubble ) . Currie Graham( Kliner Sr. ) . Marc Bendavid( Paul Hubble ) . Patrick Garrow( Spivey ) . Ava Louise Murchison( Tally ) . Sebastian Buitrago( Salazar ) . Ava Cheung( Lucy ) . Siamak Samie( Ramirez ) . Blaze( Dog ) . Catherine Fitch( Waitress ) . Paul Braunstein( Dog Owner ) . Lara Jean Chorostecki( Molly Beth Gordon ) . Peter Skagen( Chief Edward Morrison ) . Dylan Trowbridge( Dale ) . Nancy Palk( Mrs. Jobling ) . Mathieu Simard( Emmitt ) . Gator De St. Jeor( Curtis ) . Glee Dango( Tally (Double) ) . James Millington( Lloyd ) . Lauren Howe( Meteorologist ) . Madeline Ortencio( Lucy (Double) ) . Rea Nolan( Dispatcher ) . Christopher Russell( Joe Reacher ) . Alexandra Castillo( Professor Castillo ) . Kevin Kelsall( Alton County Cop #2 ) . Ali Johnson( Judy Miller ) . Paulino Nunes( Zacarias Perez ) . Deborah Tennant( Professor Bryant’s Assistant ) . Kelvin Han Yee( Marine (Butch) ) . Ahmed Mesallati( Bahari ) . Philip Williams( Rufus ) . Claire Armstrong( Debbie Shane ) . Gator De St. Jeor( Curtis ) . Alan Catlin( Earl ) . Shane Marriott( Officer Aucoin ) . JD Smith( Boyfriend ) . Janelle Cooper( Barbara ) . Benedict Marsh( Security Guard ) . Charles Semin/eperio( Shop Owner ) . Kym Mckenzie( Third Guard ) . Mika Amonsen( Officer Ribidoux ) . Kelsey Falconer( Girlfriend ) . Erniel Baez( Desk Sergeant Diaz ) . Celestina Aleobua( Atlanta Hotel Clerk ) . Jorja Cadence( Emma ) . Rohan Mead( Graham ) . Kyle Gatehouse( Alton County Cop #1 ) . Lee Villeneuve( Redd ) . Larry Peloso( Pete Jobling Sr. ) . Mikey Pimentel( Teen ) . Eli Ham( Prison Guard #1 ) . Kaz Morgan( Townie #4 ) . Jenni Burke( Jolene ) . David Patrick Green( Detective ) . Maxime Laurin( Assassin (Mateo) ) . Blake Lindsley( Curtis Bishop’s Mother ) . Tiffany Blom( Kliner Assistant ) . Emeka Agada( JD ) . Jackson Rozario( Arturo ) . Zachary Gallegos( Billy ) . Wyatt Lamoureux( Mr. Stevenson ) . Vincent Khai( Assassin #2 ) . Nicolas Grimes( Sasquatch ) . Baeyen Hoffman( Little Boy ) . Jesse Buck( Dixie Inn Clerk ) . Katherine Trowell( Mrs. Stevenson ) . Jhonattan Ardila( Victor ) . Hazel Gorin( Old Woman ) . Nathaniel McParland( Boy #1 ) . Tracey Rooney( Grace ) . Neil Foster( Buck ) . David Chinchilla( Frightened Man ) . Tyee Tilghman( Military Policeman ) . Jennifer Marshall( Second Military Policeman ) . Connor Laidman( Boy #2 ) . Maxime Savaria( Hitman ) . Adam Kenneth Wilson( Trace ) . Mathieu Coderre( Garcia ) . Scott Barker( Alabama Cop ) . Emily Fry( Dancer ) . Armando Cruz( Lopez ) . Don Retzer( Gamey Old Man ) . Mark McGrinder( Abe ) . Darrin Maharaj( News Anchor ) . Ivan Wanis-Ruiz( Rojas ) . Brendan Beiser( Tom ) . Laurie Murdoch( Minister ) . Drew Moss( Jobling Jr. ) . Mario Aguero Jr.( Bad Guy #1 ) . Raquel Duffy( Alice ) . Dorian Giordano( Skater Kid ) . Ian Blackwood( Man ) . Dan Fox( Statie ) . Danielle Getz( Woman ) . Nickolas Franco( Teenage Employee ) . Ryan Clarke( Townie #2 ) . Dylan Rampulla( Townie #3 ) . Vivian Simms( Park Kid ) . Serinda Swan( Karla Dixon ) . Domenick Lombardozzi( Guy Russo ) . Ty Olsson( Saropian ) . Al Sapienza( Lt. Drew Marsh ) . Ferdinand Kingsley( A.M ) . Shaun Sipos( David O’Donnel ) . Shannon Kook( Tony Swan ) . Luke Bilyk( Calvin Franz ) . Josh Blacker( Hortense Fields ) . Dean McKenzie( Stan Lowery ) . Ashton Cressman( Boy ) . Edsson Morales( Manuel Orozco )

Language English.

Producers Lee Child. Nick Santora. Scott Sullivan. Agatha Warren. Bill Bost. David Ellison. Dana Goldberg. Don Granger. Christopher McQuarrie. Aadrita Mukerji. Marcy Ross. Sean Ryerson. Thomas Vincent. Paula Wagner. Sam Hill.

Production Amazon Studios. Blackjack Films Inc.. Paramount Television.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2022–)
